headline: What is Business Management?
text: Business management is the coordination and organization of business activities.

headline: What is Assets Management?
text: Asset management is the practice of increasing total wealth over time by acquiring, maintaining, and trading investments that have the potential to grow

headline: What is Code of Conduct Business?
text: A code of conduct is the most common policy within an organization.
